allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(volt-translate, volt-server\): Complete Milestone 1.3 - Stub Translator + HTTP Server

First end-to-end text-in/text-out pipeline. Text enters via HTTP,
flows through TensorFrames, and returns as decoded text.

volt-translate:
- Translator trait \(encode/decode\) with TranslateOutput
- StubTranslator: heuristic word-to-slot mapping \(Agent/Predicate/Patient\)
- Deterministic hash-based word-to-vector encoding \(256-dim, normalized\)
- Vocabulary-based nearest-neighbor reverse translation
- 42 tests \(21 unit + 13 integration + 8 doc\)

volt-server:
- Axum 0.8 HTTP server with build_app\(\) for testability
- GET /health and POST /api/think endpoints
- Graceful error handling \(empty input, oversized, invalid JSON\)
- 15 tests \(8 integration + 7 doc\) including 100 concurrent requests

Supporting:
- Added VoltError::TranslateError variant \(ADR-009\)
- Added axum 0.8 workspace dependency \(ADR-010\)
- Zero clippy warnings across workspace

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
